title: Simplify Development Task UI by removing redundant elements
description: As a project manager, I want the Development Task cards to display only essential information so that the interface is clean and focused on actionable items. Remove the 'Branch:' field display, 'PR created and ready for development' status text, and 'Rebase' button to streamline the task management experience.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Remove the 'Branch:' field display from Development Task cards
Remove the 'PR created and ready for development' status message
Remove the 'Rebase' button from task actions
Maintain the 'Generate Code' button as the primary action
Preserve task title, assignee, and essential metadata

tasks.description: Update renderCodeWhispererCard function to remove branch display
